Text:
Audio Specifications:

Format: AAC-LC
Bitrate: AAC = 128 kbps / AAC 5.1 = 300 kbps
Channels: AAC-LC= 2 / AAC 5.1 = 6 channels
Sample Rate: 48000Hz
Subtitles: Hardcoded For Non English Parts
Aspect ratio looks messed up.  The people look too narrow from L-R.

thx for sharing,

quality is watchable - but the source can't be a dvd2 release

aspect ratio 16/9 is wrong - it should be 2.35:1
you can change it easily during playback with vlc/mpc hc or permanently with yamb (if you know how to calculate a the new PAR) or by extracting the video/audio streams from the mp4 with yamb and then muxing them into mkv with mkvmerge setting the AR there.
